title: Calcutta: Two years in the city
description: Amit C. has written a number of fictional books but this is more of a memoir and tells about two years of his life in Calcutta. This is the city he was born in, the home he loved as a child, the setting of his previous novels and now a part of his present (2011. He writes with "rare candor and clarity, making graspable the complex, ultimately ineluctable reasons for his passionate attachment to the place and its people".
author: Amit Chaudhuri
